title: Tenth Council Directive 84/386/EEC of 31 July 1984 on the harmonization of the laws of the Member States relating to turnover taxes, amending Directive 77/388/EEC - Application of value added tax to the hiring out of movable tangible property
header:
TENTH  COUNCIL DIRECTIVE
of 31 July 1984
on the harmonization of the laws of the Member States relating to turnover taxes, amending Directive 77/388/EEC - Application of value added tax to the hiring out of movable tangible property
(84/386/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Member States shall bring into force the measures necessary to comply with this Directive by 1 July 1985.
2. Member States shall inform the Commission of the provisions which they adopt for the purpose of applying this Directive. The Commission shall inform the other Member States thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 July 1984.
For the Council
The President
J. O'KEEFFE
